name: Hávamál
description:
Journey to the land of Hávamál in search of the Kingdom's long lost crowns. Find all five and earn your right to the Hávamál Throne!

Hávamál is an original video game concept fully created by David Contarino, specifically designed to showcase an effective and dynamic music, sound effects, and ambience system using Audio Kinetic's Wwise middleware within Unity. 

The game's interactive music system includes five originally composed, orchestrated, produced, recorded, mixed and mastered tracks by David.
